text: So quadratic funding is basically a way.
speaker: A

text: Of running a crowdfunding campaign that as democratic as possible. So basically the key idea with quadratic funding is that you set out a matching pool and you allow people to.
speaker: B

text: Sign up for a crowdfunding campaign.

text: And when they contribute to that crowdfunding campaign, then their contributions are matched by funds from the matching pool.

text: And the cool thing about quadratic funding.
speaker: A

text: And this is all credit to Glenn and Vitalik for inventing this, is that the matching is based off of the.

text: Number of contributors, not the amount that they fund.

text: Of the matching pool.

text: That the broadest swaths of the Ethereum community care about.

text: And that's really powerful because if you're not a whale, if you're just an everyday person, then it's easy to feel like your vote doesn't really matter. But with quadratic funding it does.

text: Way of taking people who are in the outer orbit of your community and.
